summary.span: 命名空间包含用于在 Web 服务器应用程序中处理 ASP.NET 用户配置文件的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to work with ASP.NET user profiles in Web server applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件用于存储和检索数据源（如数据库）中的用户设置。ASP.NET profiles are used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 配置文件信息和属性值通过使用配置文件提供程序进行管理。Profile information and property values are managed by using a profile provider. 可以通过使用 类或使用抽象类的实现，在自定义数据源中 Microsoft SQL Server 存储配置文件信息 。Profile information can be stored in a Microsoft SQL Server database by using the class, or in a custom data source by using an implementation of the abstract class. ASP.NET 配置文件是使用 [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置部分配置的。ASP.NET profiles are configured by using the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 启用启用了配置文件的应用程序启动时，ASP.NET 将创建一个类型为的新类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类继承自 类。When an application starts that has profiles enabled, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型访问器将添加到 `ProfileCommon` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property that is defined in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 类的实例 `ProfileCommon` 被设置为当前对象的属性的值 。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property of the current object. 你可以创建一个自定义配置文件实现，该实现继承自 抽象类，并为未在 [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素中指定的用户配置文件定义属性。You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and that defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element.
